name: shadders
overview: Shadders is a portal dedicated to African Fashion, Beauty and Art. Shadders main focus is to promote the work of African Artisans, on everything from fashion shows, editorials, interviews, Events, beauty makeovers, fashion and beauty tips and many more all from an African perspective. Shadders aims to speaks to all of Africaâ€™s Diaspora communities from every corner of the world. As a premier Fashion and beauty portal Shadders online experience brings Africaâ€™s best Artisans from the emerging to the established designers to the Diasporaâ€™s growing audience worldwide. Shadders strive to support the designerâ€™s endeavours of Africans worldwide. Shadders was established by Ohemma in October 2007, since then it has expanded to include an exceptional group of contributors, worldwide. Shadders began as a personal blog, but has since evolved into a respected website that reports on African fashion, photography, Art and Beauty news. Shadders currently has contributors in almost every corner of Africa, Europe, and USA If you would like to be a guest writer on Shadders then send the editor an email via editor@shadders.net We write. We post. You read and We all promote African Fashion.
